explains: vi. 加快；变活跃；进入胎动期

sentences.en: She felt her heartbeat quicken as he approached.
sentences.cn: 随着他的走近，她觉得自己的心跳加速了。

sentences.en: As the pace of modern life continues to quicken, the pressure seems to be on the increase all the time.
sentences.cn: 随着现代生活节奏的不断加快，压力似乎一直在增加。

sentences.en: We have to quicken our pace.
